titleStmt.title: Grocers-Hall, London, August 20. 1644. At the committee appointed by Ordinance of Parliament, for raising and maintaining of horse and foot, for the garrison of Glocester, and for the counties of Glocester, Hereford, Monmouth, Glamorgan, Brecknock, and Radnor.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
